questions.title: Two Sum
questions.description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.
questions.approach: Use a hash map to store the complement of each number.

questions.title: Design URL Shortener
questions.description: Design a URL shortening service like bit.ly

questions.title: LRU Cache
questions.description: Implement LRU cache with O(1) operations
questions.approach: Use a combination of a doubly linked list and a hash map.

questions.title: Longest Palindromic Substring
questions.approach: Expand around center technique to find palindromes.
questions.description: Given a string s, return the longest palindromic substring in s.

questions.title: Valid Parentheses
questions.description: Given a string containing just the characters '(', ')', '{', '}', '[' and ']', determine if the input string is valid.
questions.approach: Use a stack to match opening and closing brackets.

questions.title: Design Facebook News Feed
questions.description: Design a system to generate a personalized news feed for users based on their friends' activities and interests.
questions.approach: Use a combination of caching, pre-computation, and real-time data processing to deliver personalized feeds efficiently.

questions.title: Binary Tree Level Order Traversal
questions.description: Given the root of a binary tree, return the level order traversal of its nodes' values. (i.e., from left to right, level by level).
questions.approach: Use a queue to perform breadth-first traversal of the tree.

questions.title: 3Sum
questions.description: Given an integer array nums, return all the triplets [nums[i], nums[j], nums[k]] such that i != j, i != k, and j != k, and nums[i] + nums[j] + nums[k] == 0.
questions.approach: Sort the array and use two pointers to find pairs that sum to the negative of the current element.

questions.title: Design iCloud Storage
questions.description: Design a cloud storage system that allows users to store and sync files across multiple devices.
questions.approach: Use distributed file storage with metadata management for versioning and conflict resolution.

questions.title: Maximum Subarray
questions.approach: Kadane's Algorithm
questions.description: Given an integer array nums, find the contiguous subarray (containing at least one number) which has the largest sum and return its sum.

questions.title: Design Video Streaming Platform
questions.description: Design a scalable video streaming platform that can handle millions of concurrent users with adaptive streaming quality.
questions.approach: Use a combination of microservices for transcoding, a global CDN for delivery, and machine learning for recommendations.

questions.title: LRU Cache
questions.approach: Use a combination of a doubly linked list and a hash map.
questions.description: Design and implement a data structure for Least Recently Used (LRU) cache. It should support the following operations: get and put.

questions.title: Design Fleet Management System
questions.description: Design a system to manage autonomous vehicle fleet with real-time tracking and route optimization
questions.approach: Use GPS for tracking, machine learning for route optimization, and cloud services for data management.

questions.title: Design Telemetry Data Pipeline
questions.description: Process real-time vehicle telemetry data from millions of vehicles
questions.approach: Use stream processing frameworks like Apache Kafka and Apache Flink for real-time data ingestion and processing.

questions.title: Reverse Linked List
questions.description: Given the head of a singly linked list, reverse the list, and return the reversed list.
questions.approach: Iteratively change the next pointers of each node to point to the previous node.

questions.title: Find Minimum in Rotated Sorted Array
questions.description: Suppose an array of length n sorted in ascending order is rotated between 1 and n times. Given the rotated array nums of unique elements, return the minimum element of this array.
questions.approach: Use modified binary search to find the pivot point where the rotation happened.

questions.title: Design Ride Matching System
questions.description: Design a system to match riders with nearby drivers in real-time.
questions.approach: Use geospatial indexing for location tracking and a priority queue for efficient driver matching.

questions.title: Implement Trie
questions.description: Implement a trie with insert, search, and startsWith methods.
questions.approach: Use a tree structure where each node represents a character.

questions.title: Design Search System
questions.description: Design a search system for finding accommodations based on location, date, and filters.
questions.approach: Use inverted indexes for search, geospatial indexing for location, and a ranking algorithm based on relevance.

questions.title: Regular Expression Matching
questions.description: Given an input string s and a pattern p, implement regular expression matching with support for '.' and '*'.
questions.approach: Use dynamic programming to build a table that tracks matches between substrings of s and p.

questions.title: Design Payment Gateway
questions.description: Design a payment gateway system that can handle online transactions securely and efficiently.
questions.approach: Use microservices for different components like transaction processing, fraud detection, and compliance management.

questions.title: Rate Limiter
questions.description: Design a rate limiter to control the number of requests a user can make to an API within a given time frame.
questions.approach: Implement token bucket algorithm to allow bursts of traffic while maintaining a steady rate.

questions.title: Design Connection System
questions.description: Design a system to manage user connections and suggest new connections based on mutual friends.
questions.approach: Use graph data structures to represent connections and implement algorithms for traversal and recommendation.

questions.title: Nested List Weight Sum
questions.description: Given a nested list of integers, return the sum of all integers in the list weighted by their depth.
questions.approach: Use depth-first search to traverse the nested list and calculate the weighted sum.

questions.title: Design CRM System
questions.description: Design a CRM system that supports multiple tenants with customizable data models and workflows.
questions.approach: Use a multi-tenant architecture with shared resources and isolated data storage for each tenant.

questions.title: Apex Trigger Design
questions.description: Design efficient triggers with bulkification
questions.approach: Use collections to handle multiple records and avoid SOQL/DML limits.

questions.title: Design E-commerce Payment System
questions.description: Design a payment processing system for an e-commerce platform that supports various payment methods and ensures data integrity.
questions.approach: Use ACID-compliant transactions and database indexing for performance.

questions.title: SQL Query Optimization
questions.description: Optimize complex SQL queries with joins and indexes
questions.approach: Analyze query execution plans and use indexing strategies.

questions.title: PL/SQL Stored Procedures
questions.description: Design efficient stored procedures for business logic
questions.approach: Use modular design and error handling.

questions.title: Design Product Catalog
questions.description: Design a scalable product catalog system for an e-commerce platform.
questions.approach: Use a combination of relational and NoSQL databases for structured and unstructured data.

questions.title: Add Two Numbers (Linked List)
questions.description: You are given two non-empty linked lists representing two non-negative integers. The digits are stored in reverse order, and each of their nodes contains a single digit. Add the two numbers and return the sum as a linked list.
questions.approach: Iterate through both lists, adding corresponding digits and managing carry.

questions.title: Design Flash Sale System
questions.description: Design a flash sale system that can handle high traffic and ensure fair inventory distribution.
questions.approach: Use load balancing, caching, and a queuing mechanism to manage high concurrency.

questions.title: Design Food Delivery System
questions.description: Design a food delivery system that connects customers with restaurants and delivery partners.
questions.approach: Use geospatial indexing for location tracking and real-time data processing for order management.

questions.title: Design Delivery Partner Allocation
questions.description: Match delivery partners with orders based on location and availability
questions.approach: Use a priority queue to efficiently match partners with orders based on proximity and workload.

questions.title: Design Restaurant Discovery
questions.description: Design a restaurant discovery system that allows users to search and filter restaurants based on various criteria.
questions.approach: Use inverted indexes for search functionality and collaborative filtering for recommendations.

questions.title: Design Real-time Order Tracking
questions.description: Design a real-time order tracking system for food delivery.
questions.approach: Use WebSockets for real-time updates and geospatial indexing for location tracking.

questions.title: Design Digital Wallet
questions.description: Design a digital wallet system that allows users to store money and make payments.
questions.approach: Use secure transaction processing and encryption for data protection.

questions.title: Design QR Code Payment System
questions.description: Design a QR code-based payment system for merchants and customers.
questions.approach: Use secure QR code generation and scanning mechanisms for payment processing.

questions.title: Design UPI Payment System
questions.description: Design a UPI-based payment system that allows users to send and receive money using their mobile devices.
questions.approach: Use secure APIs for bank integration and real-time transaction processing.

questions.title: Design Payment Analytics
questions.description: Design a payment analytics system to monitor transaction patterns and detect anomalies.
questions.approach: Use stream processing for real-time metrics and machine learning for fraud detection.

questions.title: Design Payment Gateway
questions.description: Design a payment gateway system that supports various payment methods and provides webhook notifications for transaction events.
questions.approach: Use microservices architecture for different payment methods and event-driven design for webhook notifications.

questions.title: Design Subscription Billing
questions.description: Design a subscription billing system that handles recurring payments and invoicing for customers.
questions.approach: Use a scheduler for recurring payments and a robust invoicing system for billing.

questions.title: Design Cab Booking System
questions.description: Design a cab booking system that matches riders with nearby drivers in real-time.
questions.approach: Use geospatial indexing for location tracking and a priority queue for efficient driver matching.

questions.title: Design Surge Pricing
questions.description: Design a surge pricing system that adjusts ride prices based on demand and supply.
questions.approach: Use historical data for demand prediction and real-time data for dynamic pricing adjustments.

questions.title: Credit Card Pattern Matching
questions.description: Validate credit card numbers using pattern matching for Visa, MasterCard, and Amex
questions.approach: Use regular expressions to match different credit card formats.

questions.title: Design Learning Management System
questions.description: Design a learning management system for online education platforms.
questions.approach: Use microservices for different components like video streaming, progress tracking, and assessments.

questions.title: Design Many-to-Many Relationship
questions.description: Design data structure for students and courses relationship
questions.approach: Use junction tables in relational databases or adjacency lists in NoSQL databases.

questions.title: Find Common Elements in Arrays
questions.description: Given 2 arrays, find values available in both arrays in ascending order
questions.approach: Use hash sets to track elements and find intersections.

questions.title: Design Social Commerce Platform
questions.description: Design a social commerce platform that enables users to resell products through their social networks.
questions.approach: Use microservices for product catalog, order management, and commission tracking.

questions.title: Longest Consecutive Sequence
questions.description: Given an unsorted array of integers, find the length of the longest consecutive elements sequence.
questions.approach: Use a hash set to track elements and find consecutive sequences.

questions.title: Design Credit Card Bill Payment System
questions.description: Design a system that allows users to pay their credit card bills from multiple banks through a single platform.
questions.approach: Use secure APIs for bank integration and a robust payment processing system.

questions.title: Design Rewards System
questions.description: Design a rewards system that incentivizes users to pay their credit card bills on time.
questions.approach: Use a points-based system with tiers and redemption options to encourage user engagement.

questions.title: Design Fantasy Sports Platform
questions.description: Design a fantasy sports platform that allows users to create teams, join contests, and track live scores.
questions.approach: Use real-time data processing for live scoring and a robust backend for team and contest management.

questions.title: Minimum Path Sum
questions.description: Find path from top-left to bottom-right with minimum sum
questions.approach: Use dynamic programming to build a table of minimum sums for each cell.

questions.title: First Missing Positive
questions.description: Find smallest missing positive integer in O(n) time and O(1) space
questions.approach: Use index mapping to place each number in its corresponding index.

questions.title: Design Leaderboard System
questions.description: Design a leaderboard system that ranks users based on their scores in real-time.
questions.approach: Use a sorted data structure for efficient ranking and real-time updates.

questions.title: Design B2B Marketplace
questions.description: Design a B2B marketplace platform that connects wholesalers with retailers for bulk ordering and credit management.
questions.approach: Use microservices for order management, inventory tracking, and logistics.

questions.title: Design Supply Chain System
questions.description: Design a supply chain management system for tracking inventory and optimizing deliveries.
questions.approach: Use real-time data processing for order tracking and machine learning for delivery optimization.

questions.title: Design Customer Support Ticketing
questions.description: Design a customer support ticketing system that manages customer queries and tracks service level agreements.
questions.approach: Use a relational database for ticket storage and implement business rules for ticket assignment and SLA tracking.

questions.title: Design Helpdesk Chatbot
questions.description: Design a helpdesk chatbot that can handle customer queries using natural language processing.
questions.approach: Use NLP libraries for intent recognition and context management, with escalation to human agents when necessary.

questions.title: Design Stock Trading Platform
questions.description: Design a stock trading platform that allows users to buy and sell stocks in real-time.
questions.approach: Use low-latency data processing for real-time quotes and a robust backend for order execution and portfolio management.

questions.title: Design Mutual Fund Investment System
questions.description: Design a mutual fund investment system that allows users to invest in mutual funds and track their investments.
questions.approach: Use scheduled jobs for NAV updates and a relational database for investment tracking and reporting.

questions.title: Design API Testing Platform
questions.description: Design an API testing platform that allows users to create, run, and manage API tests.
questions.approach: Use a modular architecture for request building, test execution, and environment management.

questions.title: Design API Monitoring System
questions.description: Design an API monitoring system that tracks the health and performance of APIs.
questions.approach: Use periodic health checks and a dashboard for real-time monitoring and alerting.

questions.title: Design Document Collaboration
questions.description: Design a document collaboration system that allows multiple users to edit documents in real-time.
questions.approach: Use operational transformation or conflict-free replicated data types (CRDTs) for real-time collaboration and version control.

questions.title: Design Image Processing Pipeline
questions.description: Design an image processing pipeline that handles image uploads, applies transformations and filters, and optimizes storage.
questions.approach: Use a microservices architecture for different processing tasks and a CDN for optimized image delivery.

questions.title: Design Cloud Infrastructure
questions.description: Design a cloud infrastructure system that provides virtual machines, load balancing, and auto-scaling capabilities.
questions.approach: Use containerization for virtual machines, implement load balancers for traffic distribution, and use monitoring tools for resource management.

questions.title: Design Enterprise Logging System
questions.description: Design an enterprise logging system that aggregates logs from various sources and provides search and analytics capabilities.
questions.approach: Use a centralized logging platform with indexing for efficient search and analytics.

questions.title: Design Music Streaming
questions.description: Design a music streaming platform that allows users to stream audio, manage playlists, and receive recommendations.
questions.approach: Use a combination of CDNs for audio delivery, microservices for playlist management, and machine learning for recommendations.

questions.title: Design Recommendation Engine
questions.description: Design a recommendation engine that suggests music based on user preferences and listening history.
questions.approach: Use collaborative filtering techniques and real-time data processing for personalized recommendations.

questions.title: Design Twitter Feed
questions.description: Design a Twitter feed system that allows users to post tweets and view a timeline of tweets from followed users.
questions.approach: Use a combination of push and pull models for timeline generation and indexing for hashtag search.

questions.title: Design Trending Topics
questions.description: Design a system to identify and display trending topics on Twitter in real-time.
questions.approach: Use stream processing for real-time counting and a ranking algorithm based on tweet volume and engagement.

questions.title: Design Image Recommendation
questions.approach: Use convolutional neural networks for image analysis and collaborative filtering for recommendations.
questions.description: Design an image recommendation system that suggests images to users based on their interests and past interactions.

questions.title: Design Pin It Button
questions.approach: Use browser APIs for image extraction and secure communication with Pinterest servers.
questions.description: Design a browser extension that allows users to pin images from any website to their Pinterest boards.

questions.title: Design Ephemeral Messaging
questions.description: Design an ephemeral messaging system where messages and media disappear after being viewed.
questions.approach: Use time-based data expiration and secure media storage with view tracking.

questions.title: Design AR Filters
questions.description: Design an augmented reality filter system that applies real-time filters to user images and videos.
questions.approach: Use computer vision techniques for face detection and GPU acceleration for real-time filter rendering.

questions.title: Design Video Conferencing
questions.description: Design a video conferencing system that supports high-quality video streaming, screen sharing, and recording.
questions.approach: Use WebRTC for real-time video streaming and a scalable backend for managing connections and recordings.

questions.title: Design Meeting Scheduler
questions.description: Design a meeting scheduler that helps users find suitable times for meetings based on their availability.
questions.approach: Use calendar APIs for availability checking and implement timezone handling for global users.

questions.title: Design Payment Processing
questions.description: Design a payment processing system that handles online transactions securely and efficiently.
questions.approach: Use microservices for different components like transaction processing, fraud detection, and dispute management.

questions.title: Design Split Payment
questions.description: Design a split payment system that allows users to split bills and request payments from others.
questions.approach: Use a relational database for tracking payments and notifications for payment requests.

questions.title: Design Project Management (Jira)
questions.description: Design a project management system similar to Jira that allows teams to track issues and manage workflows.
questions.approach: Use a modular architecture for issue tracking, workflow management, and reporting.

questions.title: Design Wiki System (Confluence)
questions.description: Design a wiki system similar to Confluence that allows teams to create and manage documentation collaboratively.
questions.approach: Use a rich text editor for page creation, implement version control for tracking changes, and use indexing for search functionality.
